title: Tonsillitis
description: Tonsillitis is a common childhood illness but teenagers and adults can get it too. It usually goes away on its own after a few days.

options.title: What tonsils with pus-filled spots can look like

value.caption: Tonsils with pus-filled spots at the back of the throat.
value.alt: Two fleshy, red lumps with yellow spots on them, inside the mouth either side of the back of the throat
